Made for mobile

According to Google, more than half of your site visitors are using a smartphone.
Parish.es is built for mobile users. We've put content in the right spots to enable simple, safe access from smartphones.
See it for yourself

No ads

You shouldn't have to fight advertisers to communicate with your parishioners. We don't display ads like other parish websites.
